Text: Hard-sub, its a shame... wanted a clean copy

Great quality and there are actually subtitles in 10 different languages. And don't listen to that moron jaeaxp who either can't handle his mediaplayer or is a stupid troll. One last word to MXMG: I noticed the nice logo, but there is an error in it, it should actually say "Quality at its best" without the apostrophe, kthxbai
